general.gigTitle: develop and customize wordpress lms website with learndash

sellerCard.oneLiner: I believe in Quality over Quantity and Speedy Service
sellerCard.description: I am a dedicated WordPress developer nearly 7 years of experience, with 2 of those memberships and E-Learning/LMS Website Development. I have also experience in designing, CSS3, Html5, PHP, javascript and Bootstrap. I can design professional websites of all kind. Send me a message for the quote, I will always do it for you at a reasonable cost.

description.content:
Hi Mates!


Are you looking forward to developing and customizing a professional WordPress LMS site with LearDash for your online courses? Would you like to redesign and upgrade your current website?


I am a full-time professional WordPress LMS site developer with LearnDash, specializing in building responsive, SEO-friendly websites that meet your required standards.


Giving you the best quality is my priority, as my design will allow you to get more traffic, Business leads, and draw in more potential customers.


Here are the services I render:)


  • Install Learndash and configure 
  • Add Woocommerce and integrate with Learndash for selling courses
  • Create complete Online courses selling website
  •  Redesign or Upgrade Existing sites.
  •  Integrate with Memberpress for selling courses in Memberships
  • Customization  
  •  Fixing Bugs


 Why You Hire Me:


️️ I will give you a consultancy. 

️️ Provide you with online Training. 

️️ I will provide you with 2 Week of support after the website is done.

️️ Client satisfaction is my first priority.

️️ No limits to quality.



Important Note:

A brief conversation is highly recommended before you order!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do i need to get started? How do we start working together?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please send me a message before placing an order. So can discuss the project and agree on details and see which plan is suitable for you. Everyone projects have different needs, a brief conversation is highly recommended before you order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm ready to purchase the gig! What info i will need to provide you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need the domain and hosting login details or If you have already installed WordPress on the domain then provide me with your WordPress login information!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain and hosting services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I don't provide these services. But I can help you in purchasing both domain and hosting. I will also recommend you to purchase these with your own ID & Payment. So that nobody can penetrate the website even after years.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can i edit my website after?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course, you will be able to edit website easily. It is easy to edit content, add images, add banners and make any changes you may need.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can i add courses my self?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will be able to add courses easily. If you don't know about how to add course then i will teach by screensharing.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after work done?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide 2 week support after order completion/work done. If you need support for longer period like for month/year then get in touch with me and i will share my maintenance packages with you!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide the licenses for LearnDash and other plugin that you used in website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't. If you will need to use any premium plugin then you might need to purchase it.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you write the content for website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, i don't. I only provide the Website desining and development services.

packageList.title: LearnDash Pack-1 | Bug Fixes
packageList.description: In this package i will install LearnDash 3.0, Integrations and fix the issues

packageList.description: In this packge i will install the LearnDash 3.0 Also i will create the necessary pages

packageList.title: LearnDash Pack-3 | Website Design

openGraph.title: develop and customize wordpress lms website with learndash

reviews.comment: My experience with Ali was so positive that it almost seems unreal to find someone on the Fiverr platform who has this much patience true technical skills for Wordpress and Web Design. He not only understood what I needed for my site, he improved on my choices to have my site look and feel as professional as I try to present with all of my marketing materials. Ali... I look forward to the other sites we will work on very very soon.

Ali was quick, helpful, and easy to work with. He solved several issues for me and gave me some tips to improve things even more.
For future readers: I am creating a learndash course and felt some of the built-in functionality didn't quite meet my expectations, so I was searching for an expert to help me solve that. Ali delivered fast, without me being pushy, which is pretty important for me to consider a continued cooperation.

seller_response.comment: Thanks so much for your kind words! I’m really glad I could help :)

reviews.comment: Second time working with Ali. He is always there when I need help or come up with new ideas for my website. He also is a very patient person, which is very comforting. Plus: the way he works is very transparent, which gives you confidence.
I have used Ali several times and also recommended him to others. He always goes beyond expectations. You wanna use this guy!
I highly recommend for your website build. Very strong skills and great communication!

reviews_snippet.comment:
We are very pleased with Ali's work, which has exceeded our expectations. We are looking forward to continuing to work with him.
We can recommend his work to any individual or company, knowing they will be satisfied.

Working with Ali has been excellent. Very knowledgeable about many tools and techniques within the web development and design space. More than that this seller has communicated at all stages in the process and is continuously patient with my lack of expertise. 

Will definitely worked with in the future!

Very good seller, added free of charge many improvements. There were some misunderstandings, but that's because of the news writing. I recommend everyone to call zoom. Then everything is in order. Strongly recommend

Thanks a lot Ali for your support: amazing service!! Ali's exceptional marketing insights and strategic approach have significantly boosted our campaign's success. His innovative ideas and meticulous execution have been instrumental in driving impressive results. I highly recommend Ali for any marketing endeavor; his expertise is unmatched and his dedication unparalleled.

Babar is a top professional and very knowledgeable. He grasps the dynamics of the work. He is easy to work with, and we will continue to work with him on additional projects. I can, without hesitation, recommend him; you will not be disappointed.

consultationData.description: I'll consult you on building the LMS, the membership system, and the marketing automation of your website. Also, let me let you know the proper pathway  for marketing automation.
